"Xiera": "The Devil Barrier has been destroyed! Now you just have to destroy the Devil Castle...! Keep going!!"

"Destroying all of the Devil Barriers will
start an attack phase that will allow us to
destroy the Devil Castle's core.

Around this time, the Devil Castle fires a
laser beam towards the Buster Towers at regular
intervals. Quickly destroy the Devil Castle.
"
"Head towards the Devil Castle and destroy its core!"
